entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
